Poha

Description

Poha is a savory Indian breakfast made from flattened rice, spiced with turmeric, mustard seeds, and green chilies, then mixed with onions, peas, and crunchy peanuts. Topped with fresh coriander and a squeeze of lemon, itâ€™s a light yet flavorful dish.

Ingredients

  • 1 cup flattened rice (poha)
  • 1 medium onion, finely chopped
  • 1 green chili, chopped (adjust to taste)
  • 1/4 teaspoon turmeric powder
  • 1 teaspoon mustard seeds
  • 8-10 curry leaves
  • 2 tablespoons peanuts
  • 1-2 tablespoons oil
  • Salt, to taste
  • Fresh coriander leaves, chopped (for garnish)
  • Lemon wedge (for garnish)
    • {/* Add more ingredients as needed */}

Procedure

  1. Step 1: Rinse the poha under running water until soft, then drain and set aside.
  2. Step 2: Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds. Once they splutter, add curry leaves, green chili, and peanuts.
  3. Step 3: Add chopped onions and sautÃ© until translucent.
  4. Step 4: Add turmeric powder and salt, then mix well.
  5. Step 5: Add the rinsed poha and gently mix until well combined.
  6. Step 6: Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes on low heat.
    7. {/* Add more steps as needed */}
